metadata.name: The lost mermaid
metadata.description:
I stand here, right in the middle of my dreamsâ€¦
Lost in the right place.
Just as I dreamed, mountains softer than grass, pink like spring flowers...
The fragrant scent of the clouds hits my face,
I was right in the center of my dreams, on the final stage!
There were no waves, here only the wind calls me...
